title: Ewer, 1850–1900
markings: Marks: Mark on rim of silver base; "N [?], K [K]"
description: Straight-sided body flares slightly to shoulder, tapered neck, raised spout, high loop handle; silver spool stem and domed stepped base with beaded outer border; sides of body cut with vertical panels alternately plain and notched; silver base filled with wax.

tombstone.epitaph:
Ewer, 1850–1900.
1850–1900. glass, silver. Bequest of Walter Phelps Warren. 1986-61-77.
